name: Sacrifice dude
description:
What is this game ?

This is my submission for the Spooktober 2021! I made it alone in 7 days, without tryharding too much


What is it about ?

You will play as a little dark mage, who will have to survive multiples waves of Halloween-themed enemies, in order to sacrifice their souls to your master, and finally kill the super dark villain maleficent bad inimical vampire of doom.

What about the Gameplay ?

The gameplay will be pretty simple : you have two attacks, a melee one, weak but free to use, and a magic one. You'll be able to exchange souls for new spells, but using them will cost you precious HPs.

Controls
  • WASD : moving the character
  • Left click : melee attack
  • Right click : magic attack
  • Mouse scroll : spell change
